serviceOnlineTicketingDesc: Professional web-based support with ticket management, auto-responses, and email integration.
serviceWordPressThemesDesc: Secure, optimized, and scalable WordPress solutions with SEO and speed focus.
serviceWebAppsDesc: Custom React/Next.js & Node.js apps with user management and admin dashboards.
serviceWindowsAppsDesc: C# or Electron apps with modern UI, DB support, and offline use for business.
serviceExcelAccessDesc: Advanced forms, reports, and automation with VBA macros for inventory and invoicing.
serviceSmartGadgetsDesc: Widgets like weather, calendar, AI attendance with SMS/social media alerts.
